properties.Name: JournalType
properties.Description:
A classification of journal types based on their usage.

Ex:
- General Journal
- A/P Journal
- A/R Journal
- Sales Journal
- Cash Receipts Journal
- Cash Payments Journal
- Purchases Journal

where:

GENERAL JOURNAL records all business transaction not recorded in the special journals below. 

SALES JOURNAL records sales of goods and/or services to customers

PURCHASES JOURNAL records purchases of goods and/or services on credit

CASH RECEIPTS JOURNAL records the receipt of cash

SALES RETURNS AND ALLOWANCES JOURNAL records issue of credit memos giving the buyer credit for the return of merchandise to the seller and a credit for the return.

PURCHASES RETURNS AND ALLOWANCES JOURNAL acknowledges the receipt of a credit memo from the seller authorizing the return of goods and the reduction or elimination of the buyers obligation to the seller.

Columns.Name: JournalTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Journal Type.

Columns.Name: JournalTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Journal Type.

Columns.Name: JournalTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Journal Type.
